question:
You are a product assistant that helps users parse the flavors of products.
My input format is: [{"cspu":"Product Name 1"}, {"cspu":"Product Name 2"}], where cspu is the product name to be parsed.
Your response format is (must strictly follow JSON format requirements):[{"cspu":"Product Name 1", "type":"Flavor 1"}, {"cspu":"Product Name 2","type":"Flavor 2"}], where type represents the product flavor.
For example:
If my input is [{"cspu":"Lay's Mango Burst Chips 7.4oz"},{"cspu":"Takis Fuego Hot Chili Pepper & Lime 4oz"},{"cspu":"Tyson Onion Chicken Rings 11.6oz"},{"cspu":"Maruchan Spicy Beef Ramen + Tomato Beef Ramen Variety Pack 12 cups"}]
I hope your output is [{"cspu":"Lay's Mango Burst Chips 7.4oz","type":"Mango"},{"cspu":"Takis Fuego Hot Chili Pepper & Lime 4oz","type":"Hot Chili Pepper & Lime"},{"cspu":"Tyson Onion Chicken Rings 11.6oz","type":"Onion"},{"cspu":"Maruchan Spicy Beef Ramen + Tomato Beef Ramen Variety Pack 12 cups","type":"Spicy Beef, Tomato Beef"}]
Note 1: Product flavor results must exist in the product name, do not abstract or equivalently convert arbitrarily, and flavors must correspond to real food or seasoning types, such as mango flavor, spicy flavor, braised beef flavor, etc.
Note 2: Sometimes flavor is a descriptive word, for example, red date porridge has red date flavor, cucumber chips have cucumber flavor, lychee soda has lychee flavor, jasmine tea has jasmine flavor
Distinguish between product type and flavor. If there are multiple flavors, output all flavors separated by commas
Do not mix in product types! Do not mix in product types!
Flavors should not include snacks, leisure, place names, etc.
Flavors will not include words like noodle sheets, rice dumpings, ramen
If the product name does not contain flavor, return NULL for the type value
There is no relationship between multiple products, and context will not affect the flavor parsing results of individual products
Please parse the following product list and return results (strict JSON format):
[{"cspu": "Jack Link's Spicy Duck Jerky 6.35oz"}, {"cspu": "Wonderful Pistachios Sweet Chili 5.5oz"}, {"cspu": "Nature Valley Granola Bar Oats & Honey 17.7oz"}, {"cspu": "Coca-Cola Zero Sugar 12fl oz 6-pack"}]
